summary: api reservations api research
description: gain a better understanding of how the reservations api operates in order to start the conceptual components then move to the solutions components

key items of note use the reservations api module to retrieve and modify reservations on retrieval process booking.com recommends periodically calling the api every minute for example to retrieve a list of recently created modified or cancelled reservations can be accomplished with either the b.xml or ota retrieval time limit you should strive to process new modified and cancelled reservations almost however if you do not successfully retrieve a reservation within minutes after creation or modification we forward it to the property as an this ensures that a property never misses important updates

three options java library fall outside of the norms of the current distribution b.xml endpoints the reservations call is used to retrieve the following messages new reservation messages modified or upgraded reservation messages cancelled reservation messages step request for reservation information make sure to pass credentials post request nodes are sent to api step response of reservation information response model can be many things no pending new modified or cancelled reservations new reservation confirmation modified reservation cancelled reservation errors reservationssummary use the xml/reservationssummary endpoint to retrieve all of a property's reservations with dates in the future
this summary only includes information that is essential for matching future modifications/cancellations of existing reservations
no guest details included other than the guest's name
post must provide in the request body response body will return many fields pertaining to the reservation

ota endpoints this call is used for retrieving and responding to new reservations on booking.com steps for successful reservations retrieval get request to ota_hotelresnotif url get by booking.com will respond with a ota_hotelresnotifrq including a full list of open reservations by booking.com post request to ota_hotelresnotif url with ota_hotelresnotifrs message indicating a ota_hotelresnotifrs message by once booking.com receives the confirmation that the reservations were processed successfully we will remove those reservations from the queue.and respond back with ota_hotelresnotifrs success
by booking.com this call is used for retrieving and responding to new modification/cancellations on steps for successful modification/cancellation retrieval get request to ota_hotelresmodifynotif url

by booking.com will respond with a hotelresmodifynotifrq including a full list of open modification/cancellations by booking.com post request to ota_hotelresmodifynotif url with ota_hotelresmodifynotifrs message indicating a ota_hotelresmodifynotifrs message by once booking.com receives the confirmation that the modifications cancellations were processed successfully we will remove those modifications cancellations from the queue.and respond back with ota_hotelresmodifynotifrs success
by booking.com

summary: api content api data mapping and translation exercise
description: analysis of required/optional booking.com fields
work with the product manager and booking.com api to map booking.com fields to sales force and to determine any necessary translations
collaborate with the sales force team to estimate development efforts for fields and create corresponding stories for future sprints if applicable
some thoughts will need to be given for placeholder storage
to create a final product for a given property various ids the consist of the property must be retained and stored
an external id does exist for a partner like airbnb but booking.com requires multiple unique ids to complete listings
the content api requires these id types but more research will need to completed to better understand if there are any more
the ones currently known include propertyid your id
roomtypeid use the value of inventorycrossref responseinvcode from the response to your room type request
rateplanid use the value of rateplancrossref responserateplancode from the response to your rate plan request
booking.com contains many codes that may not coincide with evolve expectations
for example the screenshot from the bc api does not contain king sized beds

if evolve deems it necessary to include king sized bed some type of cross reference xref mechanism will need to be scoped and designed again king bed is potentially one of many this will also include determining the proper destinations of these xref tables and if the tables are more complex then pairs are there many attributes assigned to a given pair
if so can we add more to determine alternative or equivalent code mappings collaboration with the product managers must occur

summary: booking.com create booking service
description: overview in order to automatically create new bookings with booking.com implementation we will need to build out a new service

this should follow the previous patter as developed for homeaway and as we will be receiving payment information and will need to implement a pricing variance solution this will be more similar with the homeaway service implementation
booking api create homeaway for reference booking.com reservations api data mapping acceptance criteria this should model the homeaway logic previously created and outlined in the above doc

this ticket runs through each of these pieces and highlights where there are similarities or differences that should be specific to validate the payload this piece should be the same as existing homeaway process with the following differences we will accept the following payment methods for booking.com american express visa mastercard discover diners club jcb bancontract maestro mastercard virtual credit card mastercard google wallet union pay debit card union pay credit card payment method will require a tokenized id rather than a card number refer to set up the stripe customer and payment method needs to require same logic as in load listing information this should primarily follow the same process as homeaway
however we will not receive an internallistingid
instead we will need to match the externallistingid received from booking.com to identify the appropriate listing
this would be querying for the booking.com listing id field on listings to identify a match with the externallistingid in the payload

everything else should follow the same process except for system errors we will be creating exceptions see below create a quote from the code referral source booking.com olb value is set to true listing id from the listing loaded in the previous step from the payload listing channel listing external id number of adults number of children check in check out question first name last name email check availability this should follow the existing homeaway process inquiry availability check in the event that availability check fails create an exception see below create pricing follow our standard quoting process to retrieve the base pricing adjust pricing for pets we do not receive from the payload and will not adjust

this piece does not apply for booking.com adjust pricing for variance skip for now but we will add later determine acceptable variance skip for now but we will add later respond with failures set inquiry to if there are any failures for the above steps create an exception with the following information from the payload a booking.com reservation failed to create

please reconcile first name travellers.firstname last name travellers.lastname confirmation code reservation.externalreservationid email address travellers emails email phone number travellers.phonenumbers phonenumber listing this will be the sf digit id check in date reservation.checkindate check out date reservation.checkoutdate additionally add the following details from the quote total amount total variance create a traveler account following existing process as homeaway update the stripe customer this should be the same process as homeaway save the inquiry and inquiry line items this should be the same process as homeaway create booking previous steps same as homeaway payload olb service fee adults children check in check out question name on credit card from code status is set to pending ta approval type is set to evolve call magento same as homeaway implementation check for timeouts not needed respond successfully confirm if we will need this

summary: booking date transfers transaction due date validation
description: overview we currently run into an issue if a booking is updated that is close to that the transfer will move forward
this works without a problem if the booking is far enough in the future
when there is a date transfer to an earlier date transaction due dates are also updated relative to the new due date
as a result a transfer due date could be updated to a day that's already passed
as a result the transaction batch jobs won't pick up the transaction
this requires a manual process to transfer the transaction
we would like to build logic such that transaction due date can't be updated to a date in the past

if a due date is being modified the new due date must be greater than today use business days acceptance criteria when an update to a booking is made and due dates are being adjusted ensure that new due dates must be greater than today we should still allow the update to be made but transfer will move to today as the closest possible due date this should also take into account weekend dates for transfers we should never see an adjustment to the transfer due date where it falls on a saturday or sunday
story points medium effort low complexity few unknowns

summary: bug pass character code for stripe verification
description: overview on we noticed a significant increase in unverified connected accounts
our stripe contact mentioned the following i think there may be two contributing factors here
there has been a change in our underlying provider for identity verifications in the us and this might be causing some accounts to not being verified as before
however when your list we identified many cases in which the address has the state set as the full name instead of the code
i believe we are now verifying more closely based on this so we would recommend shifting from the full state name to the two letter code
this should help alleviate a fair amount of these accounts landing in the unverified state

he referenced this documentation which states that both versions of state values should be accepted and that state values are not but we have been able to get some accounts verified manually by using the character state code
so that does seem to be the issue
we asked our stripe rep about this and he said i believe the goal is to have either be an acceptable solution however we are seeing some verification fail due to not having the state code
this may be a short term fix if you are able to pass state code
simultaneously the team is looking in to why these failures are happening with the full state however that may be a larger and thus longer deep dive on our side
on the page of the stripe flow we ask the customer for billing address and they select state from a picklist
the picklist does not use character state codes

ideally we would not change the picklist but we would send the character state code to stripe and populate the character state code in the state or province field on the legal entity object the standard mailingaddress field on the contact should also contain the character state code for example connected account steps taken confirm the account has valid payment methods screen shot at click into the connected account verification status unverified screen shot at click on the legal entity screen shot at change the state value to a character state code screen shot at login to stripe and search the connected account id screen shot at change the state value by clicking edit and select the state from the picklist screen shot at clear the values in these fields screen shot at click submit to stripe screen shot at you should see the account in the stripe dashboard as pending screen shot at you should also see chatter post updates in salesforce for pending and for verified screen shot at verification status updates to verified screen shot at additionally the mailing address on the contact should use the character state code
screen shot at this contact should be associated as the connected account owner screen shot at

this does not need to happen in after the lead is inserted a related homeowner application record is created and the property address can be checked against the database and return either a value based on the zip code or if we already have the infrastructure in place with smartrates to support examples user enters property address with country outside of the us canada or mexico

lead is automatically and email is sent to the lead this functionality exists today possibly use green yellow red risk indicators see attached example or simply user enters property address with country us and zip code breckenridge co then this should return a pass or green value because we know this area allows str

low risk user enters property address with country us and zip code palm springs ca then this should return a pass or yellow value because we know this area allows str with permits medium risk user enters property address with country us and zip code portland or then this should return a fail or red value because we know this area does not allow str high risk so this is either based on a zip code database table or more dynamic based on geofence specific markets we have started to collect and document a lot of this data link to regulation map important consideration we do not use google places on the website today
as a result some property address data may be unclean on lead insert typos if the address cannot be validated then an error should be returned

if possible we will want to validate property address information on the lead record the homeowner application future state consideration check on evolve website when users are filling out rfi/application acceptance criteria use the work from to build a property address lightning component that can be used on the back end by evolve users to quickly add a new property address in a flow example video of flow on lead record add the component to the lead lightning page for evrn regional director users the data should save to a related homeowner application record in the following fields property street property city property state property country property zip county new field the data from the homeowner application record then pulls into the listing builder record when the user goes through the property wizard maps to existing fields on the listing record once the property address information is stored on the homeowner application record use the zip code postal code field to run a check against a list of zip codes and return a value in a new picklist field the new picklist field on the homeowner application record should be labeled location risk score the values should be high medium low create new shapes in geopinte called high risk medium risk low risk use sample us postal codes for each we will update the full list once this is complete add these shapes to assignment area we will want to run this assignment process in real time via a trigger on the homeowner application object

heres the relevant documentation see comments below if the zip code is in a high risk shape then the value returned in the location risk score picklist field would be high if the zip code is in a medium risk shape then the value returned in the location risk score picklist field would be medium if the zip code is in a low risk shape then the value returned in the location risk score picklist field would be low after the picklist value is populated notify the sales representative user via a chatter post sales rep location risk score value story points high effort medium complexity few unknowns push to production notes create shapes in production manually see comments besides these shapes we also need to create in production on the geopointe setup tab or populate using dataloader map object homeowner application assignment plan

summary: new feature new dropdown field on the listing for churn risk levels very high moderate low very low analytics
description: date submitted name chris kopel team analytics business problem we are attempting to create visibility from our churn risk model so that evolvers across all levels of the business will be able to know a listing's churn risk when interacting with owners or evaluating a listing

primary pillar owner durability total estimated impact decrease in churn per month assumptions we noticed during a test run of this model that churn may increase at the beginning of implementation
after meeting and working with performance about this we've decided that this is not a bad thing as we're flushing out some owners that already should not be in the network

while part of this model will work to filter our the owners who do not belong the larger impact of this model will work to identify which owners are underperforming or with their listing such that we can step in and communicate to them how we can best manage their property
during the test run we noticed about listings per month who are at risk of churn
these are the listings we will primarily be actioning with this model such that we may eventually cut churn by listings per month
secondary pillar total estimated impact assumptions supporting documentation

summary: security update profile change
description: turn off restrict access to custom settings for all profiles so they can read custom setting values used across the environment
points configuration
want to activate the security setting and then deploy the override
also investigate how this will impact natterbox functionality

here is an email from natterbox support i emailed you last week regarding the salesforce critical update which revokes read access to custom settings using apis from users without the customize application permission
this update will disable natterboxs cti as it denies users access to custom settings needed by the natterbox cti component
this has affected many apps so salesforce have delayed its rollout and provided a new configuration setting to mitigate the issue and allow authorised apps the required permissions

to ensure there is no interruption to your service we advise you follow these steps before january manual configuration change required the winter release the current version includes a new profile permission setting that needs to be set for all profiles applied to users that use natterbox cti

the permission that needs to be set is view all custom settings this setting is available in custom profiles and permission sets this will retain the security applied by the critical update whilst ensuring continued functioning of the cti by allowing users to have access to cti configuration data stored in the applications custom settings
this data is not accessible or shared with other apps or vice versa

here is a screenshot of the setting in a custom profile note this permission setting is not configurable in default nbvc basicuser permission set but can be set in custom permission sets if that is an easier way for you to apply it to all users

please ensure this setting is enabled checked for all user profiles before applying the critical update and definitely before january failure to follow these instructions will result in cti being unavailable for users and them not being able to make or receive calls via the natterbox app
if you have any questions/concerns please get in touch with story points medium effort complexity many unknowns

summary: listing transfer process listing creation processes

we need to make sure the old owner does not see anything related to the new owner billing payments transactions we need a clean process for an internal user to indicate who the old owner is who the new owner is and a few other data points
from there behind the scenes we need to either move copy or keep records with the original listing automatically
this entire project is to accomplish all those behind the scenes needs as well as giving the internal user an easy interface to indicate all the required data to trigger the automation

summary: update resign date population logic take
description: if a user resigns a listing the resign date automatically updates
we only want this to happen if the resign date is null otherwise the previous resign date should stay
the current logic is messing up historical churn numbers which are reviewed by leadership and the board

when an owner tells us they are resigning performance will put in a resign date but leave the status as active for rent if the owner has outstanding typically they put in a deactivation date and then the listing is automatically resigned on that date
in this process there is no issue because the automatic process does not trigger the rule to repopulate the resign date
however there are times when the rep manually resigns this listing
in this case there is a rule that will update the resign date
we just don't want the resign date to update if one already exists when the status moves to resigned
here are a few examples
you can see the resign in the history is happening at the same time

acceptance criteria when a listing status is set to resigned if the evolve listing resigned date is null populate with today but.if a listing status is set to resigned and there is already a value in evolve listing resigned date the date should not get overwritten both above should operate as noted with or without a reason value when listing won field is checked manually by an internal user ensure the evolve listing resigned date gets cleared this is existing functionality to make sure still works

we want a process to transfer the original listing to the new owner but need to prevent the new owner from seeing anything that the old owner managed billing payments transactions additionally we need to make sure the old owner can access the owner account for at least a year beyond selling house to get to tax reporting

we need to make sure the old owner does not see anything related to the new owner billing payments transactions we need a clean process for an internal user to indicate who the old owner is who the new owner is and a few other data points
from there behind the scenes we need to either move copy or keep records with the original listing automatically
this entire project is to accomplish all those behind the scenes needs as well as giving the internal user an easy interface to indicate all the required data to trigger the automation

acceptance criteria mod refund tool followup ticket required for launch if the listing had the booking id attempted to be modified refunded in the bookings on the listing the appropriate ui will display a message that this booking needs handled manually
as refunds and transfers have been split between two different parties they are not able to use the functionality in those tools today
two different devs could do these with a little ui work and query adjustments points apiece

summary: additional field below rule override box on inquiry view
travel advisor
description: create a dependent dropdown field tied to rule override on inquiries for better tracking of rule exceptions
this will help ta track the success rate of the new owner permission banner in the owner account

acceptance criteria create a new single picklist field called override context with the following values via banner response reached out no response reached out yes reached out no create a validation rule requiring a user to select an override context value when rule override true original request date submitted name danny hajek team travel advisor business problem with the new banner going up for owners to certain flexibility criteria we want to be able to quantify how this initiative is working
by adding a field once a ta hits the ruleoverride button we will be able to track how many times the surveys allowed us to book a guest without having to reach out
we can also then track how many times we had to reach out for a rule exception and were able to secure the booking and how many times we reached out and either got a no or no response'
primary pillar guest growth total estimated impact in nbv x month assumptions i created a report to look at all inquiries from may that had the rule override box checked but did not contain a booking
this basically means that we tried to make an exception to a rule but ultimately couldn't close the booking typically because the owner didn't get back to us in time and the guest moved on
another possibility was that they denied the request
the report contained inquiries from may and my assumption would be that the banner would eventually chelp us close an additional of those meaning bookings x month
i took the average ta booking of x bookings to equate to the x month
that has potential to be much higher in july and peak booking months
also this request is really in tandem with the banner and thus will be used to help quantify the success/failure of the initiative

secondary pillar owner durability total estimated impact small decrease in churn assumptions this is more vague but if we have a few hundred new owners receiving the banner questions as well as existing owners if we are able to close an extra booking or two a month because of the banner and not having to reach out to owners it could mean retaining a few owners x month that would have otherwise churned
supporting documentation

summary: update resign date population logic operations
description: if a user resigns a listing the resign date automatically updates
we only want this to happen if the resign date is null otherwise the previous resign date should stay
the current logic is messing up historical churn numbers which are reviewed by leadership and the board

when an owner tells us they are resigning performance will put in a resign date but leave the status as active for rent if the owner has outstanding typically they put in a deactivation date and then the listing is automatically resigned on that date
in this process there is no issue because the automatic process does not trigger the rule to repopulate the resign date
however there are times when the rep manually resigns this listing
in this case there is a rule that will update the resign date
we just don't want the resign date to update if one already exists when the status moves to resigned
here are a few examples
you can see the resign in the history is happening at the same time

acceptance criteria when a listing status is set to resigned if the evolve listing resigned date is null populate with today but.if a listing status is set to resigned and there is already a value in evolve listing resigned date the date should not get overwritten
in this case the listing status should be set to resigned and no updates to the evovle listing resigned date should happen

summary: performance case edits with child records
description: we want to be able to track the following via performance cases so that we can start to understand what moves the needle

who initiated a request when was the request made what was the main issue what change was made rates calendar blocks content min stays etc what dates do a change apply to do this we'd like to create a concept of child records under a performance case to track changes and resolutions
in most cases we make many changes to address a single issue
ex
owner complains about low of bookings so we will not only decrease their rates but also change min stays or maybe change up the content of their listing or maybe ask them to remove owner blocks
there are lots of levers to pull and we want to be able to measure each one separately
bi will be building a robust dashboard to help us understand what impacts performance
this is the first step in building out a larger performance object that can create alerts tasks etc
when certain thresholds are met on a listing that require us to make change

summary: poc booking cancellations and transfer reconciliation
description: user story as an evolve user i would like to propose a process when bookings are cancelled so that we can reconcile any remaining amounts that are owed to either evolve owner or in the future partners
overview currently when bookings move to a cancelled status any open charges or transfers are automatically cancelled
there are cases when open transfers to evolve or owners should be completely or partially processed but are cancelled

this ticket is to propose a process to automatically determine any amounts that are owed to each party and create new transfers for the respective amounts when a booking moves to a cancelled status and open transfers have been cancelled

this will have a two points of entry that we will need to accommodate travelers initiating cancellations via the community the cancellation flow developed in to do this we need to look at what has been collected in the first charge transaction via transaction ledgers
based upon what has been collected we need to reference the billing rules to determine who should have received what amount
when that amount has been calculated look at completed transfers to evolve and the owner to calculate totals of what has been received
then create any necessary reversals or transfers for the entire amount
refer to spreadsheet example breakdown illustrating calculation process acceptance criteria what has been successfully collected
reference any transaction where type charge transaction status completed payment status captured partially refunded or refunded
within transaction reference amount of line item in this transaction for each ledger record
look to any related refund transaction and reduce by modification amount on related refund ledgers

after determining what has been collected in each charge transaction based upon ledger details run calculation on how much each party should receive owner evolve ti evolve this should be a total amount based upon the individual ledgers that make up the transaction
depending upon the scenario there will also be instances where we will need to calculate open charges that are being cancelled to determine how much a party should have received
to determine this reference the associated billing rule on the ledger detail
look to the billing group tied to the billing rule

calculate what each party would receive for transfer amounts based upon the type multiply total amount that has been successfully collected based upon billing group information for each applicable party
this will calculate the dollar amount each party should have received
example collected in rates
based on billing group goes to owner
owner should receive from this calculation we need to compare to how much each party has actually received and create any necessary transfers or reversals
to determine what each party has received reference the retained amount on any transfer transaction where transaction status completed payment status transferred partially reversed reversed
to calculate difference from what should have been received vs what was actually received the transfer difference take ledger total for party calculated in pt
if goes to owner we need to take into account the current processing fee amount

total charge retained amount insurance amount merchant fee ledger total processing fee amount transfer retained amount transfer difference based upon each partys transfer difference create reversals of transfers for applicable amounts
ledger line items will be generic and not map to existing ledgers
transfer difference create reversal from applicable partys transaction for transfer difference amount
create charge if it does not cover amount
transfer difference create transfer to applicable party for transfer difference amount transfer difference no action needed for associated party
additional considerations there will be different scenarios to account for based upon reason for the cancellation

these will produce different results for determining how much each party should receive owner w refund owner refund traveler w refund traveler refund evolve w refund evolve refund within this process need to create internal case types and not modify transfers if the following occurs if there is a charge or refund transaction associated to the booking that does not have any associated ledgers
if retained amount of charge does not match total calculation on ledger amounts taking into consideration refund ledgers
if there is an allocation related to the booking

summary: hold single charge refund created where associated transfers are both open and processed completed
description: background if charge is refunded all or partial refund transfers associated to the refunded charge are in a transaction status of both open and completed then this is not a valid scenario because all transfers associated to single charge should either all be open or all be processed
because of this we don't want to take any further action to reduce or reverse anything before the underlying discrepancy is resolved
therefore we should display an error to the user in this scenario

acceptance criteria test that when the internal user refunds all or part of an existing charge transaction on a booking where the associated transfer transactions are in both a transaction status of completed and open the refunded amount is populated on the inquiry line items existing functionality the user receives an error exception letting them know that the associated transfers cannot be reduced or reversed
please review the transaction status

summary: hold multiple charge refund created where associated transfers are both open and processed completed
description: background if more than charge is refunded all or partial refund transfers associated to the refunded charges are in a transaction status of both open and completed then we need to reduce applicable associated transfers open and reverse/partially reverse applicable associated transfers acceptance criteria test that when the internal user refunds all or part of multiple existing charge transactions on a booking where or more associated transfer transactions have transaction status of open and or more transfer transactions have a transaction status of completed the refunded amount is populated on the inquiry line items existing functionality any associated transfer transactions are either reversed or partially reversed or reduced by the applicable amount of the inquiry line item refunded amount based on the billing rule logic see jj's design in test that the reduction of an open transfer cannot result in the transfer going below test that if the reduction of an open transfer results in or less amount the transfer is deleted test that the above execution cannot result in reversing more than the retained amount of any transfer test that the reversed amount across all transfers is equal to the amount of the initial refund test that if the internal user does not have a profile defined in story number then none of the above actions occur and an exception is recorded

summary: hold refund created where all associated transfers are processed completed
description: background if charge is refunded all or partial refund all transfers associated to the refunded charge are in a transaction status of completed then we need to reverse or partially reverse associated transfer transactions by the amount of the refund based on which line items were refunded

acceptance criteria test that when the internal user refunds all or part of an existing charge transaction on a booking where all associated transfer transactions have transaction status of completed the refunded amount is populated on the inquiry line items existing functionality any associated transfer transactions are reversed or partially reversed by the applicable amount of the inquiry line item refunded amount based on the billing rule logic see jj's design in test that the above execution cannot result in reversing more than the retained amount of any transfer test that the reversed amount across all transfers is equal to the amount of the initial refund test that if the internal user not assigned one of the following profiles then none of the above actions occur and an exception is recorded evolve executive evolve operations specialist evolve product evolve resolutions management evolve success manager lead evolve travel advisor team lead evolve customer experience team lead

summary: hold refund created where all associated transfers are open
description: background if charge is refunded all or partial refund and all transfers associated to the refunded charge are in a transaction status of open then we need to reduce the open transactions by the amount of the refund based on which line items were refunded

acceptance criteria test that when the internal user refunds all or part of an existing charge transaction on a booking where all associated transfer transactions have transaction status of open the refunded amount is populated on the inquiry line items existing functionality any associated transfer transactions are reduced by the applicable amount of the inquiry line item refunded amount based on the billing rule logic see jj's design in test that the reduction of an open transfer cannot result in the transfer going below test that if the reduction of an open transfer results in or less amount the transfer is deleted test that if the internal user does not have a profile defined in story number then none of the above actions occur and an exception is recorded

there is also an algolia search team workspace in postman which includes browse examples
when running the first postman browse call you will pass a null or empty string as the cursor variable

the resulting response will end with the following as an example nbhits page nbpages hitsperpage processingtimems query params cursor nbhits tells you the total number of objects the browse has found page is the page number you are currently on with an empty cursor variable it will be zero as you pass in the cursor updates it will move to etc
nbpages is the total number of pages the current query will return with the number of hits per page
by default this is the maximum of if we ever needed to break it into smaller cunks we can have a variable to reduce the number of we dont need to do so for this

see hitsperpage above query should be empty for this story but if we needed to we can pass a query as outlined in the algolia api documentation to reduce our results params will return the parameters fed into the query
in the postman workspace this all exists in the body cursor is the position the current returned results end at
for the next query to resume at the next result and beginning of the next page in this case the cursor variable of the next call needs to have this value for its value

the body of the next request would then be cursor attributestoretrieve objectid note that you can pass the cursor with or without the trailing characters and at the end of the response to that request is so the next call would have the new cursor of and that would continue until you reach the last page at which point there will not be a cursor returned
that is the biggest clue that we have reached the end of our results
you could also compare the page to the nbpages and when page nbpages weve reached the end of the list
loe high complexy low testing high unknowns many

summary: documentation booking.com boomi process testing
description: document the test process for include the process for the stage environment and the production environment
booking.com boomi process testing endpoint/connector testing bc documentation go on the booking.com api documentation and get the required to hit for requests
if there is a request response received confirmation it should use this endpoint as well but read into the documentation to make sure

postman endpoint testing use a postman request to hit each endpoint with a sample request that matches the documentation may have to create a test reservation for one of our listings in booking.com depending on what the request calls boomi connector testing do this for all connectors and endpoints in the boomi process

note possible return errors and make sure to catch and handle them appropriately and log all relevant information for tracing back the errors you have to check that when you send a reception of data confirmation back to bc that they send a success response back as well boomi connector error handling depending on if the bc documentation gives you any make sure to handle any errors that might are given in the documentation or that you get throughout testing make sure to log these errors in the boomi atom queue process testing data format before a data mapping/transformation occurs you must check that the incoming data profile is correct using a message shape and a notify message shape set a message shape to static value and copy paste some sample code that the profile should be able to you created the profile by importing a file make sure this is a different file otherwise it would pass regardless put a message shape immediately after the message shape that pulls a specific variable from that specific profile type

run in stage molecule look if any errors are generated and debug data transformations write a business rule shape that takes the outgoing data profile from the transformation(using a message shape before the transformation as a test handler and check that any complex manipulation that occurs outputted the correct results

use process properties to make it modular repeat for multiple different incoming data payloads for exhaustive testing logic trees create a message shape with static data that when evaluated by the logic tree you are testing should conclusively lead to one specific branch
set this branch to log a message of success to the process log

the branches that it should not evaluate through should have notify message shapes that throw errors and break the process do this for each branch and when testing is over make sure to remove error notify message shapes write a test handler and run the entire process checking the results of connectors and transformations with decision business rule shapes
repeat with different data in the test handler until you are confident that all minutia and outlier cases have been handled correctly

summary: api airbnb message development incoming message
description: inbound message from airbnb to sf as shown in the conceptual architecture the communication to airbnb to evolve flows as follows as noted notifications from hosts must be ignored
airbnb link in general flow should go as follows airbnb hits boomi endpoint this is an existing endpoint the is leveraged by the airbnb reservation api as well

the endpoint will call process the differentiating factor is that the message will contain as the value along with the message object and a thread in reservation the value is reservation_acceptance_confirmation along with the reservation air_postnotificationhandler is responsible for sending the message to the atom queue airbnbnotifications queue
air_notificationpubliser then listens for events in the airbnbnotifications queue

air_notificationpublisher will have to have a new branch created action equal to this branch will map a new json profile called air_messagefromabb to json profile message the json profile message should be similar to json profile

document will then be sent to a newly created message queue a new will have to be created this will listen for new documents in the message queue created create a mapping from profile message to a new sub process will be called and shared amongst other distribution channels in the future
lets call it sub this will be the process where an http client connection is made to sf api note that the endpoint that is called will be no response is returned to airbnb

summary: spike distribution specific by distribution channel
description: overview spike ticket to research and identify implementation of necessary transformations for all distributions in relation to distribution fees
the goal of this ticket is to perform research on each distribution channel to plan and identify the best approach so that we are able to apply distribution-specific based upon data in salesforce
as part of the distribution rules epic the salesforce team has built out a field on the booking rule object that will drive which we want to display on particular distribution sites
on the booking rule we have a new field picklist
values booking.com homeaway vrbo airbnb website tripadvisor the applied distributions field determines which fee or insurance we want to display on different distribution sites
based on the values selected should drive what we display
for example if a fee only has applied to it we should not be displaying it on any other distribution sites

summary: spike markups by distribution channel

on the distribution we have two new fields this is a percent based field this is a picklist
values rates fees insurance the markup field determines the amount that we would like to mark up
the markup applies to field determines what we want to apply the markup to
example markup applies to rates rate advertised rates note if we are marking up insurance we will not want to go over the max price listed on the booking rule
full markup examples cost calculator

summary: airbnb syncronous check failures audit
description: overview airbnb is requesting that we investigate our high percentage of synchronous checks failing or being rejected
we need to investigate the attached csv and provide a solution on why these are failing
seems like this could be related to existing availability issues we have seen before
context from airbnb completed an audit on our api platform and we have some findings like to share with you

found that there is a high percentage of synchronous checks failing or being rejected from your application and as synchronous checks are essential in the reservation flow it is a rather critical component in the health of your integration as high failure rates for synchronous checks means that reservations are being rejected

attached is an export of our logs for the synchronous checks that sent to your application for the dates of we would like for you to study these error logs and offer our assistance in figuring out why these rejections and failures happened

an explanation of the fields in the attached csv ts timestamp in utc the http status we get from your server or what caused it to fail whether this synchronous check passed did we move on to the next stage in the flow type of sync check what we saw your response payload as webhook_parameters our payload to you in the webhook in this context there are two types of failures that we would like to address and i think good for us to align on the difference between what failed webhook and a rejected webhook for a failed webhook this would be when we send a webhook and we run into a http error code or there is an error in processing that does not allow us to proceed
as we do not retry synchronous checks an error like a http returned from your server to us would deny a reservation to a guest even if the date was actually available
another notable error we can see in your report is operation_timedout which indicate that the sync check was not replied to within rejected webhooks however are slightly different
these are when the webhook was fired and returned successfully with http but instead got a reply of available false or succeed false
this means that your app specifically returned these values due to a lack of availability or to reject a reservation

while sync checks are a way for us to avoid double bookings repeated rejections should not be occurring as a lack of availability should trigger an update to a calendar in order to block out the dates as unavailable
future guests would then not be able to see these dates as available and would not be able to book them
we would like for you to look into this and maybe investigate how we can lower the frequency of these issues so that we may address the problem of repeated reservation failures on the part of guests
if you have any questions about what said in this email or would like to clarify anything please do let me know

acceptance criteria investigate attached csv identify ongoing issues that could be causing us to continue rejecting failing the webhooks propose possible solutions can be addressed in followup tickets if

summary: work orders initial creation page layout
description: as a photography internal evolve user i want to easily confirm cancel or reschedule photo shoots so that i can track the outcome and cost for each individual photo shoot
overview work orders are not currently utilized in our production environment
this story is to modify the existing layout and functionality in the stage environment for the photo shoot record type on the work order object
currently photo shoots are tracked using the photography case record type only
the goal is to continue to use the photography case as a request ticket and the related work order to track the details of the actual photo shoot
to improve efficiency a work order will be created and with specific data points including line items when a new photography case is created

acceptance criteria when a new photography case record type is created a new work order will also be created automatically related to the case the values in the contact address name of condo/apartment bedrooms bathrooms and unit size fields on the case will populate on the work order this exists today in stage environment the value in the listing field on the case will also populate on the work order the value in the price book field should default to photography when the internal user is viewing the work order object there is a free text field for notes to owner and a free text field for notes to photographer these fields currently exist on the photography case record type page layout when a new work order is created then one work order line item should be created with base pay populated in the description the quantity for this work order line item should populate with a value of the unit price for this work order line item should populate with a value based on a formula
the formula is based on the unit size of the related listing

if the unit size is less than then the unit price should for each additional increment of in unit size then the unit price should increment by examples in unit size the value in the product field will default to photo shoot when a new work order is created then one work order line item should be created with travel compensation populated in the description the quantity for this work order line item should populate with a value of the unit price for this work order line item should have a null value the value in the product field will default to photo shoot note a new product may need to be added to accomplish this when a new work order line item is created the status will default to in progress when the internal user is viewing the work order object there is a field for grand total the grand total field is the sum of the total price on all related line items where status on the line item is equal to in progress pending payment or paid

summary: work orders payment processing
description: as an evolve accounting user i want to view all work orders in completed pending payment status and the associated cost so that i can efficiently process all payments and mark them as complete

overview payments are currently made to each photographer individually but after the payment is complete the accounting team needs a way to quickly bulk edit records and mark all as paid a similar concept exists today in production
in this list view we give specific users the ability to change status on multiple records at once

acceptance criteria when the originals received checkbox is checked true on the parent photography case then the related work order automatically moves to completed pending payment status when the child related case photo edit case record type moves to closed successful status then the work order line items on the related open work order will automatically update to pending payment status the work order status will not change when the photo edit case record type child is closed successful there will be a picklist field on the photographer account for payment method'

when the partner contact value is entered on the work order then the payment method should also be referenced and visible on the work order there will be a checkbox field on the photographer account for first photo shoot'
when a new photographer account is created this will be checked true by default

when the first work order related to that photographer contact moves to completed paid status then the first photo shoot checkbox will be unchecked on the photographer account the first photo shoot checkbox field will also live on the photography case record type layout the photo edit case record type layout and the work order layout when a photographer contact is populated in the partner contact field on the photography case the photo edit case the work order then the first photo shoot field will be checked true if the box is checked true on the photographer account when an internal user is viewing the work order line item layout they will see a field labeled paid timestamp when a work order line item moves to paid status then the paid timestamp field will be populated when an internal user is viewing the photographer account layout they will see a related list of all work orders that the contact has been associated with when the work order is moved to completed paid status then all related work order line items are automatically moved to paid status when the work order is moved to completed paid status then this email template will send from the parent photography case to the partner contact from photography@evolvevacationrental.com when the work order moves to completed paid status this should also update the photography complete checkbox on the related listing which drives the tracker component in the community

make the class without sharing add an adjustpricingforoptionallineitemsanddiscounts method to the class this does the exact same logic as the adjustpricingforoptionallineitems but will also determine and record if a discount additional line item should be added and for how much assuming no discount line item or additional line item currently exists at all and for that amount this design will limit to only adding one discount line item and one additional line buildquote after createratelineitemsbyinquiry and before applyspecials will call a new method creatediscountlineitem when a user populates the associated fields needed to trigger creating a discount additional line item

discount line items will be recorded as a negative number
discount tax will be calculated on the amount after the discount is applied

example if a discount was indicated by the user on a rates total of after discount rates total is tax is applied on discounts will always be quantity discounts are always type rates so that we recalculate fees taxes etc
based on the rate after the discount is applied

in the totalprovidedlineitemsbytypes method include any discount line items added whenever the ilitypes contains rates discounts only apply to rates then as it loops through all the line items to determine the resulting amount and marketing cost adjusting the loop as needed to accommodate the negative discount value
additional line items will be recorded as a positive number

additional line item tax will always be calculated on the amount of the line item example if an event fee of was included as an additional line item tax rate is applied to the event fee tax added additional line items are always type fees include taxable has to be true additional line items will always have a quantity additional line items will always inherit the party fee markup of the referral source defined at the beginning of the booking tool flow will no longer call adjustpricingforoptionallineitems it will instead call the new adjustpricingforoptionallineitemsanddiscounts with no discounts all test cases should pass and everything should work as expected full booking tool process flow here ui for optional fees screen with additional line item discount fields adjustpricingformanualadditions which takes the quote object single line item for discount takes a list of line items for additional fees booking controller tool creates the discount line item and creates the additional fees from user input gets called after createrates applyadditionalfees method after the flat fees are calculated and before the percent fees may have to apply the marketing cost in the booking tool controller not the quote engine

summary: fee builder shell and first screen of
description: we will be using a new sandbox for this projectfb a test listing has been created we want to build a tool that will assist internal users in building rules easily and correctly
this tool is intended to walk them through the process in an intuitive way
we are going to start with fees only
this first story will be the first of pages of the tool
the first page will be the initial setup and include fields that apply to all fees
the second page in another story will show other related fields based on what was entered in the first page
i created a survey to sort of mimic the conditional for these screens
go through the flow of creating different types of cleaning fees

its not exact just meant to help illustrate we do similar conditional actions in the property wizard too attached is a of an example selection as well as an overview of how the fee information should be structured

summary: tax insurance ardi on booking.com
description: overview due to a limitation on booking.com end we must either tax no fees or tax every single fee associated to a listing

this presents a problem because we pass ppp as a fee on booking.com therefore ppp will end up being taxed on booking.com we need to create a solution so that we are able to have a unique insurance booking rule associated to a listing
this will set is taxed true on the ppp insurance rule and we should quote taxes on the insurance within our quoting process
otherwise we will always have a variance on every single booking
the problem is that insurance is calculated last after taxes in the quoting process so the current setup will not support this
we need to adjust so that flat per night insurance ppp can be calculated before tax so that tax can include this
percentage based tax does not need to be included in the tax calculation

this ticket is only to adjust the new quoting service not the existing update booking acceptance criteria with just the new quoting engine quoteforinquiry rearrange the buildquoteresponse.insuranceflatlineitems to occur before the tax calculations this should be it

however we need to add a new test case specific to taxing a flat fee setting up a booking rule for bc where the damage protection is taxed is true and the tax booking rule includes the insurance in the percentage bases hence damage protection ends up taxed travel insurance the percent based one does not end up taxed

with the way we changed the optin and opt out previously we should need no more changes for this portion while in there please put the specials grouping after rates in the totalprovidedlineitemsbytypes for consistency specials are calculated before fees so fees are always empty when specials are called add new picklist value to percentage basis on tax booking rule record type insurance ardi test that we see the following add a new damage protection booking rule insurance ardi to a listing
set is taxed true and applied distributions booking.com modify existing damage protection rule on listing to include all applied distributions except booking.com set is taxed false

ensure that listing has a tax rule where percentage basis rates fees specials insurance ardi confirm a new booking with referral source booking.com test that the tax line item is calculated based on rates fees specials and insurance ardi confirm a new booking with referral source homeaway test that the tax line item is calculated based on rates fees specials

this should not be calculated off the insurance ardi line item since is taxed false update the following documentation with the changes quoting story point medium effort medium complexity few unknowns

summary: pricing variance booking.com
description: overview since booking.com will not be hitting us with a quote we will need to implement pricing variance on all listings
this will overall follow a very similar structure as with homeaway
refer to the adjust for pricing variance section on the homeaway booking service
when a booking is received we will match our line item totals to account for the difference in price

booking.com booking service needs to follow the same process

here is an example of a homeaway booking line item where the total rate amount received by homeaway reflected but evolves quote reflected evolves quote was lower than homeaway we record variance the main difference is that booking.com will not pass the same payload information as homeaway
we need to account for the order items received

example booking.com payload booking.com will be broken down into different buckets by orderitems to match up totals amountbeforetax this will include the total rates and extra person fees when there is a discrepancy take off equally from all rates all fees except extra person fees when there is a discrepancy take off equally from all fees insurance order item name service charge when there is a discrepancy take off equally from insurance ardi tax when there is a discrepancy take off equally from all tax we will also implement a flag if variance is greater than a certain amount link to order item fee mappings on reservations api mapping doc order items mapping fee line items final cleaning water usage bed linen club card credit card parking gas cleaning tourism destination fee|destination tax city tax goods and services tax vat government tax service charge|insurance rates amountbeforetax|amountbeforetax|rates video recording of meeting covering pricing variance acceptance criteria implement pricing variance for the booking.com bookings service test the following if amountbeforetax is different from evolve quotes on total rates we record the variance positive or negative across all rate line items this should not record variance on extra person fees if the total fees orider items is different from evolve quotes on total fees we record the variance positive or negative across all fee line items

this should exclude extra person fees if tax order items is different from evolve quotes on total tax we record variance positive or negative across all tax if service charge order items is different from evolve quote on insurance ardi we record the variance positive or negative and adjust the amount across insurance ardi line item
design notes for implementation so the only structural design of this is centralizing the code in the booking service utilities to be used by the rest create bc booking class
however this is fairly technically complex as detailed below
currently there are some outstanding additions that need to get added to the bookingserviceutilities to make this work easier
we are waiting on and to be completed then needs completed

then this ticket can be started assuming no other tickets are added for these booking services before first things first study how we are doing the variance checking for homeaway starting with the checkvarianceneeded variable in the rest_createhomeawaybooking and primarly the method determinevarianceexists in the bookingserviceutilities
this work will be replacating the same order of operation of logic for this service it just has to apply different conditions based on differences between ha and bc

in bookingserviceutilities the method determinevarianceexists is used by the homeaway service to determine if there is a variance present first then when true calls adjustforvariance and finally calls isvariancehigherthanallowedscope to determine if the total variance is too high to accept and we fail the booking
however with the differences in bc classifications and how it groups line items we cannot reuse the determinevarianceexists and adjustforvariance methods directly

basically the primary work is sperating the data which you can use homeaway as an example for and tying it into the booking service with the adjustments to the rest_createbcbooking to handle these variance checks and responses

the second piece of primary work is mapping out the variance calculations similar to the adjustforvariance method used with the home away service to call its methods and set the line items variance amounts and change the marketing cost amounts
since these are specific values to distributor while you can reuse the varianceamounttracking map you reuse the methods
with that said booking.com service will follow the same pattern but we need to define a unique method to determine if variance exists for booking.com line items
we will not check for variance on specials or recalculate any specials bc will not have specials

otherwise this method will use the mapping in the attached document to group our rates against bc rates our fees against bc fees our taxes against bc taxes etc to populate the same varianceamounttracking map

with this unique method for booking.com you will have to group evolve quoted rates and any extra person fee in the same category against bc rental order items and exclude evolve extra person fees from the fee group of bc fee order items

otherwise the method is mostly the same as the existing determinevarianceexists but the grouping will have to check a set combination of fee tax insurance specials and rental names provided from booking.com in the attached document

if it is true we do have a variance then in the rest_createbcbooking class again reference this portion of the code in the rest_createhomeawaybooking file for an example we will next want to record a seralized payload agaisnt the inquiry field for business research and call the new adjustforvariance method for booking.com this will once again be almost identical to the existing ha one just changing the map references

summary: messenger case assignment rules investigation
description: overview we are having some assignment issues on messenger cases
it seems like there are conflicting case assignment rules that continue to overwrite one another
they are continuing to assign to the owner support queue
in some instances cannot assign the case into a user's name the most common occurrence is that we see the case assigning to the owner support queue
from case history it seems like the case originally assigns to the correct queue travel advisor guest experience resolutions queue but then reassigns to the owner support queue
from troubleshooting in it seems like this could be associated to our support settings that it
we also see an issue where if the case is on waiting on evolve response it cannot be reassigned to a users name
example business context on case assignment before a booking is confirmed the messenger case is managed by the travel advisor team
this team works with the traveler to answer questions before booking
they do not need direct ownership of cases which is why we always reassign to the queue on response after a booking is confirmed and before the messenger case is managed by the guest experience team
they answer general questions and typically dont need full ownership of the case
if a guest responds within hours we want the same person to be able to answer the question
but outside of hours it can likely be handled by another user so we escalate to the queue
after the messenger case is managed by the resolutions team
they handle escalated cases and need ownership of the case
it should never assign to the queue after a user claims ownership as we want the original user to be able to respond
only should assign to the queue if it is not responded to within hours status waiting on evolve response acceptance criteria investigate cause of conflicting case assignment rules

correct so that we are able to assign messenger cases as originally set in and we should see the following on new case creation requirements if there is no confirmation code we assign to travel advisor queue if there is a confirmation code we assign to guest experience queue if there is a confirmation code and less than today we assign to resolutions queue we should see the following on existing cases reopening for escalation rules requirements if booking confirmation is null and case reopens to waiting on evolve response from a new message being added always assign to the travel advisor queue regardless of last message response booking confirmation code is not null and is greater than or equal to today and if last message response hours ago and case moves to waiting on evolve response after new message is added reassign case to the guest experience queue if case remains in waiting on evolve response for hours reassign case to guest experience queue if confirmation code is not null and less than today and case reopens to waiting on evolve response after new message is added do not reassign case to queue should reopen case in users name

if case remains in waiting on evolve response for hours reassign case to resolutions queue if booking confirmation code is added with the new message assign to the guest experience queue requirement this should only occur the first time a booking confirmation is added to the case

when the first message is added after booking has passed date where less than today assign to resolutions queue with the above rules we need to ensure users are able to claim ownership of a case out of the queue should not overwrite a users ability to claim a case into their name story point medium effort medium complexity many unknowns

summary: bug traveler support failed charge email
description: overview there has been a recent change in the blackthorn package where charges will be captured in the morning on the due date rather than where it had previously charged at night on the due date

this poses a problem because the reattempt on charges will be triggered at a later time
example first charge fails am first email triggers am not an issue payment method is updated am this sets the charge true w due date second email is triggered am this is the issue
we triggered the email but did not attempt to process the charge
that would happen about mins later charge is successfully captured am the email for payment decline is being sent just after midnight before we attempt to collect the payment
in the example above we sent that an email at am that stated their payment had declined in actuality we have not even attempted to collect it
the payment was successfully captured at and we collected a penny too much so they never received a payment confirmation email
acceptance criteria propose possible solutions to avoid the timing issue with the final payment decline
propose possible solution so that we send final payment confirmations if we collect too much due to a rounding issue

summary: booking mod override ticket
description: overview this is a followup ticket from the attached ticket this ticket related to quoting
reference the existing quoting document after the availability check in ticket we will want to be able to create an update quote based upon the changes

additional context we currently run into an issue when a user makes an update to a booking through the update booking tool and does a date transfer i.e and dates on the update booking tool we will run a calculation on the difference
what occurs after submitting is that new line items will be created through a booking update inquiry based upon the dates and then moved to the inquiry tied to the booking
when this occurs the original line items are deleted and transaction amounts are not updated
this causes the ledgers to lose key information for reference
the new line items do not record any ledgers and are not associated to any transactions

we would like to create a solution if possible that will not lose transaction ledger information and update transactions with the appropriate values if the total amount increases with the date transfer
if the total amount decreases we would expect to see the same functionality that exists today with reductions

acceptance criteria technical outline requirements modify the classes updatebooking method to quit making and saving a brand new inquiry to the database and its deletion to create an in memory inquiry and use the new checkavailabilityhelper from ticket one use the prepare booking rules and quote for inquiry class to get a list of in memory inquiry line items when needed to price the new inquiry use these line items for comparison against the original line items in its current logic modify the interface updatebookingduelpanl to show warnings that the user needs to confirm or deny plus the business logic requested for its operations update tests for the confirm deny logic operations and any changes needed from using the new quoting engine not this new inquiry returned will never be saved its not needed line item adjustments depends on the business request end user requirements after availability check is completed we should return a list of updated line items in the update booking tool this should ultimately look the same as it does today in the ui
if the user selected override in the previous ticket they should be able to submit the change to the ticket after the quote is generated

we should not see that a new inquiry has been created any new line items should be tied to the original inquiry we should not delete existing inquiry line items we need to compare line items from the updated quote if there is a change of dates that results in a price difference we should create a date transfer difference in rates line item for rates
we should also calculate a difference in tax and display as a date transfer difference in tax line item

could be positive or negative we should record the date that it applies so that it can be reduced if needed date transfers should not remove information from ledgers this should create new ledgers to reference current line items amounts and due dates should be updated on all charge transfer transactions we should create a new charge if this has created a positive difference
of the positive difference and add to future charge
same logic as when we add a night if the total amount is less we should reduce future charges transfers
same logic as removing a night and we process reduction story points high effort high complexity many unknowns

summary: refunds where owner fault one or more cancelled transfers
description: as a customer experience user i want to automatically reduce or reverse owners transfers when a refund is made against a booking and the owner is at fault so we have less manual reconciliation to do
overview when we issue a refund to a traveler we can determine via the refund page who should be responsible for covering the refunded money
this story is how to handle refunds when the owner is responsible and transfers that go to the owner have at least one transfer in cancelled status
notes any amounts refunded from damage protection or travel insurance will be handled separately and should not count towards money reversed from the homeowner
calculating processing fees owners are responsible for the processing fees on charges minus money paid towards damage protection or travel insurance
when we reduce or reverse their transfers we need to take into account the processing fee on the amount refunded

we will refer to the merchant fee percentage on the booking which will either be or if we refund in cleaning fees to a traveler for example the processing fee on that amount will either be or depending on the percentage on the booking

so we will reduce or reverse the amount refunded minus the processing fee or in this acceptance criteria when a refund is created and owner is selected as the responsible party and one ore more transfers where goes to owner is cancelled we will deplete the amount available on the homeowners transfers calculate the amount needed to from the homeowner amount refunded merchant fee percent of amount if the calculated amount is less than the amount/retained amount of all open or completed transfers to the homeowner if there are multiple transfers to the owner and at least one is completed or open deplete the first transfer
reverse or reduce the first completed or open transfer by the calculated amount if less than or equal to the retained amount of the transfer
deplete the next open or completed transfer by the remaining amount if necessary

if the calculated amount is more than the amount/retained amount of all open or completed transfers to the homeowner and at least one transfer to the homeowner is cancelled do not process any reversals or reductions against the open or completed transfers create a case type internal case owner billing queue booking number account name account related to the listing related to the booking listing related to the booking case origin internal priority medium subject transaction reconciliation refund from owner description guest has been refunded insert amount refunded and owner is responsible for insert calculated amount please assess transfers to the owner and reconcile as needed

examples we refund of rates to the traveler the merchant fee is and the owner has two transfers and both are completed/cancelled transfer completed transfer open transfer cancelled expected result transfer completed is reversed transfer open reduced to transfer cancelled no action we refund of rates to the traveler the merchant fee is and the owner has two transfers transfer completed transfer cancelled expected result a case is created
