summary: refunds where owner fault open and completed transfers
description: as a customer experience user i want to automatically reduce or reverse owners transfers when a refund is made against a booking and the owner is at fault so we have less manual reconciliation to do
overview when we issue a refund to a traveler we can determine via the refund page who should be responsible for covering the refunded money
this story is how to handle refunds when the owner is responsible and transfers that go to the owner are in both completed and open status
notes any amounts refunded from damage protection or travel insurance will be handled separately and should not count towards money reversed from the homeowner
calculating processing fees owners are responsible for the processing fees on charges minus money paid towards damage protection or travel insurance
when we reduce or reverse their transfers we need to take into account the processing fee on the amount refunded

we will refer to the merchant fee percentage on the booking which will either be or if we refund in cleaning fees to a traveler for example the processing fee on that amount will either be or depending on the percentage on the booking

so we will reduce or reverse the amount refunded minus the processing fee or in this acceptance criteria when a refund is created and owner is selected as the responsible party and transfers where goes to owner are both completed and open we will deplete the amount on the homeowners transfers calculate the amount needed to from the homeowner amount refunded merchant fee percent of amount if the calculated amount is less than the retained amount of the first earliest completed transfer to the homeowner reverse the calculated amount from that transfer if the calculated amount is greater than the retained amount of the first completed transfer but less than the sum of all transfers completely reverse the first transfer if the next transfer is also completed reverse the remaining amount from that transfer if the next transfer is open reduce the remaining amount of the refund from the next soonest transfer

if the calculated amount is greater than the sum of all transfers reverse the retained amount of all completed transfers update all open transfer statuses to cancelled create a charge to the homeowner for the remaining amount this work is done in reason type guest examples we refund of rates to the traveler the merchant fee is and the owner has two transfers transfer completed transfer open expected result transfer is reversed transfer is reduced by new amount is we refund of rates to the traveler the merchant fee is and the owner has two transfers transfer completed transfer open expected result transfer is completely reversed transfer is cancelled a charge is created to the homeowner and on the billing plan for the remaining processing fee

we will refer to the merchant fee percentage on the booking which will either be or if we refund in cleaning fees to a traveler for example the processing fee on that amount will either be or depending on the percentage on the booking

so we will reduce or reverse the amount refunded minus the processing fee or in this acceptance criteria when a refund is created and owner is selected as the responsible party and all transfers where goes to owner are completed we will reverse money by depleting the retained amounts of the homeowners transfers calculate the amount needed to from the homeowner amount refunded merchant fee percent of amount if the calculated amount is less than the retained amount of the first earliest completed transfer to the homeowner reverse calculated amount from that transfer if the calculated amount is greater than the retained amount in the first transfer but less than the sum of all completed transfers to the homeowner reverse the calculated amount from the first earliest transfer reverse the remaining calculated amount of the refund from the next transfer
if the calculated amount is greater than the sum of all completed transfers reverse the retained amount of all completed transfers

create a charge to the homeowner for the remaining amount this work is done in reason type guest examples we refund of rates to the traveler the merchant fee is and the owner has two transfers and both are completed/transferred transfer expected result transfer is completed reversed transfer partially reversed by we refund of rates to the traveler the merchant fee is and the owner has two transfers and both are completed/transferred transfer expected result transfer is completely reversed transfer is completed reversed a charge is created to the homeowner and on the billing plan for the remaining processing fee we refund in damage protection and in rates to the traveler the merchant fee is and the owner only has one transfer and it is completed/transferred transfer to owner expected result transfer is partially reversed for remember we handle damage protection separately

summary: available for refund calculations specials
description: user story as an evolve user i would like to update the available for refund logic on the bt_bookingrefund tool so that it can accommodate instances where there are specials involved so that i have accurate data available when processing refunds through the tool
overview through work in we now reference transaction ledger amounts to determine values for the available for refund column
in some instances this does not run accurate calculations if there are specials being applied

specifically there are two cases where this can occur scenario if there is one charge captured one open charge and there is a special applied to the booking available for refund appears to revert back to previous logic inquiry amount inquiry amount*discount example scenario if a discount has been applied as a result of a modification the special is not applied to modification ili
through investigation in order to group specials together with ledgers we need to reference the created date of the ledger
example scenario if a discount has been applied to a booking and there is a previous refund on the reservation available for refund will not calculate correctly
this appears to calculate as if there has been more refunded on the booking than transaction ledgers indicate
example we need to account for these scenarios in the calculations
acceptance criteria scenario update available for refund logic to account for instances where a special has been applied to the booking and there is an open charge

test that available for refund accurately calculates ledger amounts when all charges are complete test that available for refund accurately calculates ledger amounts when there are open and completed charges scenario update available for refund logic to run calculations on specials that are the result of a modification
through investigation in order to identify which special is applied to which ledger amount we need to group by the created date of the ledgers
to determine which ledger should be reduced by the special we also need to match the ledgers line item type to the special booking rule

percentage basis on the booking rule identifies what ili type that booking rule applies to within available for refund calculations reduce all ledger amounts on the transaction that were created at the same date as the special ledger by the percentage amount of the special where percentage basis of related booking rule inquiry line item type of related ledger example a transaction has two specials
special was created on the other on by referencing the percentage basis and percentage field on the booking line item we know that both specials apply reduction to rates
we should reduce available for refund calculations for ili ledgers on the same transaction where line item type rates by if they were created on the same date as that particular special

for this example we apply off special to rates created on and additional off special to rates created on if there are two specials created on the same date or there is a special does not have any ledgers created on the same day where it could be applied display error at the top of the refund page and display on all ilis
same functionality as developed in pts
text for error message please note unable to reference transaction ledgers
please refer to inquiry line items to determine available for refund amount
test that available for refund can be accurately calculated when a special is applied to a line item in the event of a modification
test that specials that are the result of a modification can be accurately calculated on the correct line item if the specials ilis were not created on the same day
test that if a booking has a special created from a modification on the same day as another special the ui will display an error message at the top and for all ilis
scenario update available for refund logic to account for instances where a special has been applied to the booking and there is a previously refunded charge
test that available for refund accurately calculates ledger amounts when there is a special applied to a booking and a refund transaction with transaction ledgers

summary: reversals from refunds on travel insurance and damage protection one or more cancelled transfers

overview when a refund is created through the refund tool and any amount refunded is from the travel insurance or damage protection line items we will always reverse or reduce those amounts from the transfers to evolve ti or evolve ppp connected accounts

this is regardless of who is selected as the responsible party which will be important in other reversal this story is to handle refunds made through the refund tool against insurance when at least one transfer is in transaction status cancelled

transfers go to evolve ti connected account per billing rules damage protection is type insurance booking insurance type ardi

if there is only one transfer no action needed
if there are multiple transfers to evolve ppp and at least one is completed or open deplete the first transfer
reverse or reduce the first completed or open transfer by the amount refunded if less than or equal to the retained amount of the transfer
if the refunded amount is greater than the open or completed amounts no further action is needed
example line items refunded are damage protection refunded additional damage protection refunded transfers:transfer completed original
reverse all transfer cancelled original amount
no action
this section is the same as above but specific to travel insurance for testing purposes
when a travel insurance line item is refunded through the refund tool and one or more transfers to evolve ti are cancelled
if there is only one transfer no action needed
if there are multiple transfers to evolve ti and at least one is completed or open deplete the first transfer
reverse or reduce the first completed or open transfer by the amount refunded if less than or equal to the retained amount of the transfer
if the refunded amount is greater than the open or completed amounts no further action is needed
test that any reversal of a transfer also creates a reversal transaction record
test that if a transfer that is reversed is true then the reversal transaction is also true
record an exception if any of the above processes cannot be completed

upon refund the first charge was refunded not the second

reference the first charge processed for transaction ledger refund
if amount of line item in this transaction does not cover the full refund amount reference the next processed charge for the remaining difference

documentation has been attached on how the refund page is running calculations example in this example the total amount to refund is the calculation is determining that we should refund and a total of this is refunding a tax percentage of tax to the correct value should be the result is an incorrect amount recorded on the booking line items after the action is taken
we need to correct the formula for this calculation since the individual tax line item calculations need to be adjusted in this instance since they do not reflect the true tax amount

as a guide we could instead create a calculation as follows taxrefund amountrefund total taxrate individual line item taxrefund x line item tax total tax in the same example as above amount to refund tax line taxrefund and tax line tax calculation x then amount to refund and tax to refund from this calculation or approx which is correct acceptance criteria modify the logic above so that in the event of multiple tax line item amounts it will accurately calculate the total tax amount and then distribute to each tax line item accordingly
test that when compared to amount to refund total the individual line items accurately reflect the tax line item percentage

test that amount to refund on the individual tax line items total to tax to refund test that totals at the bottom tax to refund total tax test that the updated logic will work for instances of multiple tax line items as well as individual tax line items ensure that the calculations display properly as set in and populate on the line items when submitted as set in

overview airbnb or tripadvisor bookings do not get a near term rate special applied to their booking even if it is available as an active rule
when the booking is created in this scenario the near term rate line item is still present on the booking but it is zeroed out
when refunding a booking in this scenario the near term rate is not recognized as and is factoring in what the special should be in the available to refund
this means that we wont be able to refund the full amount of what was actually paid
this story is to both fix the issue and do research and provide documentation on how the refund page calculations are currently set up for reference as we continue to improve this page

example booking in stage click on refund notice that the available for refund on the nightly rates is instead of even though the near term rate line item on the booking page is acceptance criteria if a booking line item is a near term rate and the total amount do not factor this into the amount available for refund confirm that near term rate is the only kind of special where the line items are automatically zeroed out research and provide documentation on how line items are calculated on the refund page including how the high level amounts are calculating total charges total refunds available for refund amount to refund tax to refund total refunds how the line items themselves are calculating when refund tax is checked or when it is not checked any further technical documentation on how this page functions so we have a place to reference as we continue to make improvements

summary: apply specials to available for refund amounts
description: background currently in the refund page on the booking if there is a specials line item on the booking it will show up on the refund page but the user cannot refund from that line item
this makes sense the problem is that the specials amount is not discounted from the line items from which that special was applied to
this results in the user being able to refund more from a line item then was actually charged to that line item
currently this is not a huge problem because the validation in place only allows the user to refund up to how much as been charged

this will be a problem though with the reversals automation because that logic will use the amount that has been refunded from each line item type to determine how much to reversal or reduce the transfers by so this amount needs to be accurate

here is how the refund page looks today you can see the specials amount is not being taken out of the available to refund amounts on the other line items also these amounts do not reflect the actual available amount to refund based on captured charges example booking in stage acceptance criteria test that when the internal user is viewing a booking that has a inquiry line item where type specials and the user is viewing the refund page there are no line items displayed where type specials the amount of any specials line items on the bookings are taken out of the available amount to refund of all other line items that the special applied to get this information view the percentage basis field on the booking rule associated to the line items use the related percentage of the special to calculate how much should be removed test that the user can no longer refund the amount of the special that was removed from the other line items

summary: photo upload page drag and drop sort order
description: user story as an evolve user i want to be able to drag and drop images on the images page in an intuitive way so that i can quickly and easily get all images in the correct sort order
overview in the current implementation dragging a photo to a new area on the page swaps the photo sort order with the existing
instead the image should be placed in that position and should shift all the other images down one position in the sort order
for example if photo is dragged to position then it is correctly placed as photo but the previous is moved to we need the previous to shift to position to shift to and so on
users also need the ability to drag and drop multiple photos

example video of issue acceptance criteria when a user drags and drops a photo into a new position on the page the image is moved to the new position and all following images are shifted down one position in the sort order when a user selects multiple images on the page they have the ability to drag all selected images to a new position on the page when the multiple images are moved the sort order is updated for all images and all following images are shifted down one position in the sort order

summary: vrp create payment bug
description: there have been issues reported where a payment will be run through vrp create payment on the booking object without logging the credit card transaction success activity in salesforce
this will create a charge through magento but the amount fields on the booking object will not accurately reflect
this event will also not be present within the activity history within salesforce
the issue is generated when using the createbookingpayment visualforce page
this will call to magento which in turn calls back to salesforce to log the activity history
we confirmed there is no error occurring within magento
however we believe at some point in the process that magento is attempting to update the booking there is am error occurring which will result in the activity not being logged
the goal of this ticket is to identify the error that is occurring when these steps are taking place
from what we are able to gather pos_apiaddccrequest is creating the credit card transaction success activity
we need to put error handling around insert event and update booking
that error handling should record the payload they received from magento
examples booking within activity history on there was a transaction successfully captured and processed within vacationrentpayment
however this activity was not logged within salesforce this same type of event has also been reported on the following bookings video of payment process without defect error occurring

summary: work order cancellations
description: there will be a new checkbox field on the work order labeled hour cancellation checkbox if the evolve user hits the cancel photo shoot button within hours of the start date and status on the work order confirmed then the hour cancellation checkbox is automatically checked the hour cancellation checkbox will not be checked if the user selects any of the following cancellation reasons unanticipated weather unanticipated maintenance if the work order status cancelled then automatically create a clone of the existing work order including line items and amounts on the newly created work order the photo shoot attempt value will default to reschedule if the work order status cannot complete then automatically create a clone of the existing work order including line items and amounts on the newly created work order the photo shoot attempt value will default to reshoot if the work order status closed unsuccessful and reason quality issue missing photos or not enough photos then automatically create a clone of the existing work order including line items and cost on the newly created work order the photo shoot attempt value will default to reshoot

summary: listing approval page
description: user story as an onboarding user i want to some additional validation to the listing approval process modal window in the community so that homeowners do not submit feedback multiple times on the same page and overwrite the data on the onboarding case

overview today during the approval process homeowners are presented with buttons on the bottom of the listing detail page where they can either approve their listing or request to make changes example if they request changes the onboarding case related to the listing is updated and text is populated in these fields the issue is that the page does not automatically refresh when the homeowner user clicks submit changes'
the original comment is stored on the onboarding case on the back end but then the user adds more feedback and clicks submit changes again
the new data overwrites the old data without users knowledge

as a solution we would like to introduce a new pop up notification when the homeowner user clicks submit changes see attached the user will confirm that they have entered all the feedback and upon clicking yes submit the modal window will close and the page will refresh

example video of current issue page does not refresh acceptance criteria when the user clicks submit changes in the modal window then a pop up notification will appear see attached mockup when the user clicks yes submit on the pop up notification then the modal window will close and the page will automatically refresh when the user clicks go back on the pop up notification then the pop up window will be closed and they will be returned to the modal window

summary: transaction ledger booking modifications
description: background internal users need insight into what inquiry line items and what percentage of those line items make up each transaction
this is where the ledger concept will come in

we will need to display the following fields for all line items that made up that transaction via combination of inquiry line item and matched billing rule line item description line item type original line item amount of line item in this transaction this story is to add line items or modify existing line items on the existing transaction ledger when a modification is made to a booking update booking acceptance criteria test that when a booking is modified via the update booking functionality any of the following are added to the existing transaction ledger on all transactions that are updated by the booking modification any newly created line items that are now included in a transaction any existing line items where quantity changed from to greater than that are now included in a transaction test that none of the existing ledger is changed when a modification occurs test that negative line items reductions are included in the ledger test that when a booking modification results in a new transaction a new ledger is created for that transaction same logic as at booking creation

summary: unapplied credits per listing account
description: user story as an evolve support user i would like to add a field two fields one on the listing object and the other on the home owner account record type that will display a total of all related unapplied credits to increase reporting purposes and eventually be able to display this amount to home owners
overview currently we use the object where record type credit to apply credits to a listing
the record will always be associated to both an account and a listing
the unapplied total field on the object will populate the remaining amount associated to a credit
we would like to create a field on the listing object that will reflect the sum of unapplied total for any associated credit record types
we would also like to create a field on the home owner account record type which will serve as the same function reflecting the sum of unapplied total for any associated credit record types

acceptance criteria create a field on the listing object listing unapplied credits if an associated credit record type is created add the value in the unapplied total field to the listing unapplied credits field created in point if the unapplied total amount field on a credit record type is reduced or increased ensure that the listing unapplied credits field reflects the new value
if multiple credits are associated to a listing unapplied credits should be a sum of all unapplied total amount fields of the credits associated to the listing
if a credit record type is deleted or removed from a listing ensure that the listing unapplied credits no longer populates the unapplied total associated with that credit
if a listing does not have any associated credits listing unapplied credits should be not null
add an additional field to the home owner account record type account unapplied credits will follow the same logic from points where the credit is associated to the account
example listing a does not have any associated credits
listing unapplied credits on listing a should be credit is created and associated to listing a
credit has an unapplied total of unapplied listing credits on listing a should be credit status changes
credit unapplied total changes from to unapplied listing credits on listing a should now be credit is also created and associated to listing a
credit has an unapplied total of unapplied listing credits on listing a should now be credit changes status
unapplied total on credit has been reduced from to unapplied listing credits on listing a should now be credit and credit both change status
unapplied total on credit has been reduced from to credits total on listing a should now be

summary: update booking with a failed charge same day
description: background when a booking is created with a failed charge and an internal user makes an update to the booking on the same day as the booking was created the failed charge is being adjusted to reflect the new amount due from the update

acceptance criteria test that when an internal user makes an update via the update booking button to a booking that was created today and has a charge transaction where transaction status failed any amount adjustments that need to be made to the same day charge are made to the chrage where transaction status open test that transactions with transaction status failed are never updated as a result of a booking modification via the update booking functionality

summary: photo upload process internal evolve users
description: as a product marketing user i want a page for ordering photos and adding captions so that i can quickly complete this step of the listing build process
overview currently we leverage a visualforce page example that was a part of the property wizard at one time

we no longer allow homeowners to upload their own photos so this process can be handled internally using a solution that is not a visualforce page as we consider the migration to lightning for our internal users
current functionality/process user clicks on listing images related list on the listing object then clicks the images button which takes the user to a visualforce page
here the user has an option to select files which launches the file finder
once files are selected the user has the option to upload files
then the user must select edit images to add captions and the images
currently users can add up to images our average file size per image is around if a user adds more than characters in caption then all captions are deleted
users must select each image individually and then click approve then they must click save to sync the images to the evolve website

acceptance criteria after files are uploaded to box the photo edit user will have an option to sync files to a specific listing in salesforce so that they are already uploaded for the product marketing user to caption and once the images are uploaded to the listing a chatter post notification will be sent to the listing owner and onboarding manager on the listing users will have options to delete or approve images and then a save and close action which will close the screen and return the user to the listing on the page users will have an option to select all before they take an action to approve or delete the images by not approving an image the image will still appear on the evolve website but will not pass through api to distribution sites on the detail page users will have the ability to see the original file name of the image on the main page users will have the ability to drag images to the images and the sort order field will update accordingly the thumbnail image will be larger than it currently is and the aspect ratio will be users will have the ability to click on an image to expand and view a larger gallery style ui in the gallery users will view the large image at aspect ratio the caption will be displayed here and users will have the ability to edit the caption on this screen and the new caption will be saved automatically there will be visible character count with a limit of characters users will have the ability to scroll through all images in the gallery users can add up to total images we typically add deleting an image will remove it from the photo edit page but stays in the list view with a rejected status the functionality of the list view and detail view of images will remain the same users can see status of the image sort order and caption the functionality with aws will remain the same users will see the change history of images

for example user changed caption from x to y or user changed sort order from x to y future considerations users will have the ability to add a tag to an image users can report on the tags we may have the ability to pass image tags through api information on integration

summary: booking object send email modal
description: user story as an evolve customer experience user i would like to create a new send booking update button that will launch a new email modal so that i have increased control and functionality in sending emails out of the booking object
overview we would like to use the existing proof of concept within and apply this to email functionality on the booking object
we have current functionality on the booking object through an sendupdatedconfirmationemails page and createbookingpayment page
the existing create booking payment page allows users to send emails to the traveler and listing contact roles based upon an action selected via picklist
the existing updated confirmation emails page allows users to manually select templates via checkbox and send to the selected traveler and listing contact roles

we would like to combine the functionality of these through the user interface developed within as with like this tool to be flexible so that it can be leveraged for other business use cases having the ability for our developers to the default email templates and set the default send to please ensure lightning compatibility within this modal acceptance criteria see mockups for reference place a new button on the all booking object page layouts titled send booking update when user selects send booking update from the booking object the modal is launched
email modal is able to pull in associated traveler from the booking and all listing contact roles on the associated listing
top section of modal displays traveler bottom section of modal displays all associated listing contact roles the user has an ability to select which email address to send the email from

available options user@evolvevacationrental.com travel@evolvevacationrental.com success@evolvevacationrental.com the selection in point will determine the email address being sent to the traveler contact as well as any emails within the additional to field

all contacts within the listing contact roles section will be sent from success@evolvevacationrental.com user can select the following action values via picklist send instructions cancellation w refund notification payment confirmation change in dates addition of nights reduction of nights optional fee adjustment change in guest count based upon the action selected in point traveler and listing contact roles will with corresponding templates according to the role found in the following outline note ideally this action would happen on one window within the modal
however if needed this piece could be accomplished through a separate select action window when the modal is launched
please provide a recommended solution

listing contact roles will display their associated role the user can select or deselect the contacts that have been autopopulated the user can select a unique email template for each contact the user can add another contact and search for another email template underneath traveler section there is an additional to text field box
this will allow the user to manually input an email address not associated to a salesforce contact and select a template to send
the user can choose to not send any emails the user can cancel the action entirely there is a button labeled send which will send the emails to all contacts and email addresses selected

summary: recommendation links based on listing channel fixes to similar listings vf page
description: user story as an evolve travel advisor user i want traveler customers to be routed to the site that they inquired from when evolve is offering recommendations so that the customer experience is seamless

assumptions per the development and implementation of refer to the following file list vf component inquiryrecommendation similarlistings classes controller_inquiryrecommcomponent controller_inquiryrecommcomponent_test controller_likelistings listinghandler listinghandler_test inquiryhelper email template inquiry_recommendations acceptance criteria add additional logic to the listed in the assumptions section if an inquiry has a referral source homeaway or vrbo the url link generated in the controller should be either homeaway.com or vrbo.com and the related listings has a value in the no offline booking start date field then the url generated in the controller used in vf component should be the website related to the referral source with the correct external id variable passed into the url as well also fetch and append the external id fields vrbo id homeaway id related to the referral source to provide an acceptance test for this logic test that on this inquiry in stage since the inquiry referral source vrbo the no offline booking start date field in the related listing is not equal to null the vrbo id field in related listing the url returned in the link within the vf component generated from the new controller logic should be test that this logic works for homeaway as well using this test inquiry since the inquiry referral source homeaway the no offline booking start date field in the listing is not equal to null the homeaway id field in related listing the url returned in the link within the vf component generated from the new controller logic should be on the similar listings vf component on the listing object make the following changes similar listings vf page is found by navigating to an inquiry object and viewing the vf page in similar listings section update the table so that instead of listing price the average per night field is instead displayed in that column on the table

it is possible however that listing data is returned on creation but then filtered out from the vf component after the listing is booked for the inquiry checkin/checkout dates

summary: populating refunded amount on the tax inquiry line items
description: background currently there is a refunded amount on the inquiry line items
